summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4570 for the improvement of the alley in block 40, S.A. Bell's 2nd Addition, from Virginia Street to Lenora Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53363, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
